game.name: Lucky Pikinini - IMS Intelligence Corp
game.shortDescription: IMS Intelligence Corp is a Large-Scale First-Person / Third-Person Story-Telling Game with a 13-Chapters Story Campaign, 4-Maps Special Missions & 33-Maps Survival Mode. It Happens Same Time As the Events of Super Incursion & IMS Death Squad. You Take Control of IMS Daryl Kalashi.
game.shortDescriptionEn: IMS Intelligence Corp is a Large-Scale First-Person / Third-Person Story-Telling Game with a 13-Chapters Story Campaign, 4-Maps Special Missions & 33-Maps Survival Mode. It Happens Same Time As the Events of Super Incursion & IMS Death Squad. You Take Control of IMS Daryl Kalashi.
